name: Dino Arc
description:
Made by Leon Arndt, Anika Han, Lea B, Toshia Gabriel.

Controls:

Arrows Keys to Move

Ctrl to switch Dinos

Space: Shoot Dinos and Activate their Parachute

Also use space for the special laser once it's charged

How to play?

Habitate planets with dinos. Don't let the dinos crash into things.

Once your meter is charged press space to break open an asteroid and retrieve a new egg. Try to habitate all the planets!
